VoiceList.Entry: “We've been fighting the Shinra on this battlefield for a long time.”
“We've still settled in for a long war with them.”
“Could you spare some time, and help us fight them?”
“We don't want to sound pushy, so if you're busy with something, why don't you finish that first?” Where is Junon? We'll help you
“We don't want to sound pushy, so if you're busy with something, why don't you finish that first?” Like to help but… I guess we'll help
“We don't want to sound pushy, so if you're busy with something, why don't you finish that first?” I'm sorry…really All right,we'll help
“Let's see…head north along the coast, keep going a ways and you'll run into Junon.”
“But be alert because it sits in the shadows of a small hill.”
“All right then… Take care of yourselves…”
“Really!? Then go on up and they'll fill you in on the details.”
